snippet.title: Warden's Will | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Warden’s Will launches on January 8, 2025, at just $14.99 USD! 🚀

The wait is over! Mark your calendars and prepare to dive into Warden’s Will, the roguelite third-person movement shooter that will test your reflexes, strategy, and skill in intense bullet hell combat.

💥 What to Expect:

- Master Movement & Skills: Fly, dash, hover, and leap and smash through dynamic 3D battles.
- Epic Bullet-Hell Combat: Dodge, weave, and obliterate waves of corrupted machines.
- Build Your Power: Collect augments, master weapons, and create unstoppable combos.
- Solo or Co-op: Go it alone or team up with friends in 3-player co-op mode.

Master the movement. Protect Yourself at All Times. Dominate your thousands of enemies. The challenge awaits on January 8, 2025. Are you ready?

In Warden’s Will, movement isn’t just a tool—it’s your survival. Players must fly, hover, dash, leap, and smash through dynamic environments such as floating lava worlds, sprawling deserts littered with towering scrap, deep caves, space stations, and more. With roguelite elements, players grow stronger each run, experimenting with builds and playstyles to face ever-escalating challenges.

🗓 Mark Your Calendars and get ready to forge your legend in the fires of battle!
Wishlist Warden's Will now on Steam and be the first to play when the game drops. 🔥

Steam Page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1689640/Wardens_Will/

Subscribe for updates, gameplay, and more:
https://www.youtube.com/@WardensWill

Discord: 
https://discord.gg/K72cR3C4Ae

Reddit:
https://www.reddit.com/user/WardensWillGame/

Twitter / X: 
https://x.com/WardensWillGame
